Syndicate.definition: a group organized to carry out a particular transaction or enterprise 2
Syndicate.origin: [French syndicat the office or jurisdiction of a syndic]

1.definition: a group organized to carry out a particular transaction or enterprise

2.definition: an association of organized criminals[sin-di-kāt] vb

-cat·ing.definition: to form or manage as or through a syndicate [atax shelter]to unite to form a syndicate
